rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may integrate another creature you control. If you don’t, tap Xavvac, Corrupter Core. [i](To integrate a card, exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
Permanents you control with cards integrated onto them have lifelink and deathtouch.
notes:
